mapper.update: update Score set mark = #{mark} where "student_id" = #{student_id} and "course_id" = #{course_id}
mapper.delete: update Score set mark = null where "student_id" = #{student_id} and "course_id" = #{course_id}
mapper.insert: insert into Score (student_id, student_name, course_id, course_name, mark) values (#{student_id}, #{student_name}, #{course_id}, #{course_name}, #{mark})
mapper.select: select * from Score where "course_id"=#{course_id} ORDER BY mark ASC
select * from Score where "course_id"=#{course_id} ORDER BY mark DESC
